Version: 
1.0

Author: 
Juliano S. Cabral

Date: 
1.7.2020

Spatial extent: 
Theoretical Island 4-81 sites.

Spatial resolution: 
none

Temporal extent: 
140-0Ma

Temporal resolution: 
1 time-step = 1Myr

Environmental variables: 
- Temperature (degrees celcius) 
- Precipitation (mm/year) 

Cost function: 
1 to all sites

Source Data: 
R-package gen3sis

Publications: 
O. Hagen, B. Fl√ºck, F. Fopp, J.S. Cabral, F. Hartig, M. Pontarp, T.F. Rangel, L. Pellissier. gen3sis: The GENeral Engine for Eco-Evolutionary SImulationS on the origins of biodiversity.

Description: 
Theoretical Island used at mentioned publication.
